summary: Replacer plugins and patches for various author's mods
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][color=#00ff00][size=6][b][center]Visdagon's Replacers and Patches[/center]
[/b][/size][/color][/font][size=4]
This page will house the various plugins that I have created or will create. Sections will be added with every mod added, see below for their descriptions.
While I do create some plugins for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/?]PerMa Compatibility and PaMa Patches[/url] those will be added to that page to help keep such mods all in one place, and most if not all of the plugins found here will have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url][/size] [size=4][b]versions of them on the PCaPP page.

[size=4][b][color=#9900ff][size=5][color=#00ff00]_________________________________________________________________[/color][/size][/color][/b][/size]
[color=#9900ff][size=5]MiniArmorsCollection[/size][/color] [/b][size=3]by[/size][b] Gutris1 and Dallesse

[size=3]This is a replacer .esp created from MiniArmorsCollection created by Gutris1 and Dallesse, which is a merged plugin for all of Deserter X's great armors created for Skyrim(so far). It adds Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade compliant crafting recipes to every outfit. The craft books that were included are still there, but they are not required to craft the outfits. Instead, perk requirements are now required. The books otherwise function in the same way. This replacer does not require the MiniArmorsCollection plugin itself, but it Does require the original armor files from Deserter X or any of the reshaped versions that are available including those on the MiniArmorsCollection page.[/size] This is only a plugin, you need the actual armors from elsewhere.

[size=4][b][b][size=3][color=#ff0000][size=4]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color][/size][/b][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][size=3][u]ALL DLCs[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url] and everything it requires[/size][/b][/size][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?]Ancient Draugr Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/?]Cassandra Frost Witch Outfit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?]Celes Nightingale Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/?]Daedric Reaper Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?]Emfy Cleric Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?]Gwelda Armor Pack[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?]Gwelda Red Riding Hood Outfit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?]Merta Assassin Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?]Merta Black Rose Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?]Sotteta Huntress Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?]Sotteta Necromancer Outfit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?]Tembtra Thief Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53494/?]Wild Huntress[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection[/url][/size] - [size=3]While their plugin is not needed, I have linked it here as a source of excellent UNPB
conversions and HDT Cloaks for these outfits.

[/size][size=3][b]Perkus Maximus version can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D59257&pUp=1]here[/url][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][color=#9900ff][size=5][color=#00ff00]_________________________________________________________________[/color][/size][/color][/b][/size]
[color=#9900ff][size=5]UNP Jewelry Variants[/size][/color] [/b][size=3]by[/size][b] [b]Aurielius[/b]

[size=3]This is a replacer .esp created from UNP Jewelry Variants by Aurielius, which is a revised version of a mod made by Petrovich. This replacer requires that mod to be installed first. This replacer adds Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade compliant crafting recipes and conditions to every piece of jewelry.[/size]

[size=4][b][b][size=3][color=#ff0000][size=4]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
[/size][/b][size=3][u]ALL DLCs[/u][/size][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url] and everything it requires[/size][/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28780/?][size=3]UNP Jewelry Variants[/size][/url]

[size=3][b]Perkus Maximus version can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D59257&pUp=1]here[/url][/b][/size]
[color=#9900ff][size=5][color=#00ff00]_________________________________________________________________[/color]
KS Jewelry [/size][/color][/b][size=3]by[/size][b] [b]Stealthic Khaos and Kalilies
[size=3]
This replacer adds crafting recipes to the great jewelry they created. [color=#ff0000][size=4][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b][b][size=3]The recipe [size=4][b][b][size=3][color=#ff0000][size=4][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b][b][size=3]ingredient [/size][/b][/b][/size][/color][/size][/color][/size][/b][/b][/size]requirements are included in a readme included with the download. These recipes are compliant to Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade's MCM Inventory Conditions toggle settings.
Â [/size][/b][/b][/size][/color]
REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
[/size][/b][size=3][u]ALL DLCs[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url] and everything it requires
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]KS Jewelry[/url][/size][/b][/size] [size=3][b]because this is only a replacer plugin, you NEED the original mod from them

Perkus Maximus version can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D59257&pUp=1]here[/url]
[color=#00ff00][size=4][size=4][b][color=#9900ff][size=5][color=#00ff00]_________________________________________________________________[/color][/size][/color][/b][/size]



[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b][b][color=#ff0000]PERMISSIONS FOR USE[/color][/b][/b][/size][/font]
[color=#ffffff]
These are works done by me from works done by others. Follow the chain of credits and receive their permission, you require their permission not mine.



[/color][/size][/color][/b][/size][color=#00ffff][size=3][b][size=4][size=4][b][b][size=3][size=4][size=5][i][u]CREDITS[/u][/i][/size]
[/size][/size][/b][/b][/size][/size][/b][/size][/color][size=3]The following are the creators of the mods these plugins and patches were made from and made with.
Check out their other great work.[/size]

[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url] [/b][/size]by [b][size=3]Kryptopyr[/size][/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?][size=3]KS Jewelry[/size][/url][/b] by [size=3][b]Stealthic Khaos and Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection - UNPB[/url] [/b][size=2]by[/size][b] [b]gutris1 and dallesse[/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28780/?]UNP Jewelry Variants[/url] [/b][/b][size=2]by[/size][b][b] [size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/50430/?][b]Aurielius[/b][/url][/b][/size] [/b][/b][size=2]and[/size][b][b] [size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/66282/?]Petrovich[/url][/b][/size]
Deserter X[/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573/?]nsk13[/url]
[/b][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1046420/?][b]Mitosuke[/b][/url]


[color=#00ff00][size=4]Special Thanks[/size][/color]
Obviously every author whos work is represented here. If it wasn't awesome I wouldn't want to tinker with it.
[size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291352/?]Kryptopyr[/url] for help using CCOR
[size=3][b][color=#d0e0e3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4536241/?]Raulfin[/url][/color] for answering many questions, and more questions, and some questions
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Static-X]Static X[/url] for keeping the rest of my brain occupied during editing. RIP[/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
